name: Dodger's Destiny
description:
It's a dodger type game where the main goal is to dodge your enemy. 

It is a mix of dodger and action as later on in the game, you'll be rewarded with a sword to win the boss fight.

Hey Guys!
Up arrow key: move forward
Down arrow key: move backward
Right/Left arrow keys: only for rotation... No movement
Z to use health potions
